# cs 700--Assignment 2
Github: https://github.com/ttq693/Assignment-2
Language standard: C++
IDE: CLion IDE

##Introduction

Section 1 directory contains solution for the first problem of the assignment and section 2 contains the second one.

##Directory Structure

##section-1
--main.cpp-- contains the main function
--helpers.h/helper.cpp-- This module contains functions necessary to populate and fill array with random values
and print the results
--html--This directory contains the html documentation generated by doxygen
---screenshot contains the screenshot of the testing

##section-2
--main.cpp-- contains the main function
--sin_cos.cpp contains the sin() and cos() function
--tester.h/ tester.cpp contains the Tester class that provides all necessary functions 
to test sin() and cos() functions
--html--This directory contains the html documentation generated by doxygen
